title: Elmish Land Route Configuration
description: Configuration file for type-safe route and query parameters in Elmish Land pages

pathParameter.description: Configuration for the dynamic path parameter (e.g., _Id in /Users/_Id/Page.fs). Enables type-safe path parameters beyond strings.

module.description: Fully qualified module name containing the type and functions (e.g., 'System' or 'MyProject.Common.Types')

parse.description: Function name to parse string to the type (e.g., 'parseGuid', 'parseInt'). Must have signature: string -> 'T option

format.description: Function name to format the type to string (e.g., 'formatGuid', 'formatInt'). Must have signature: 'T -> string

queryParameters.description: Configuration for typed query string parameters. Each parameter becomes a strongly-typed field in the route type.

name.description: Name of the query parameter in the URL (e.g., 'page', 'sortBy'). Will be converted to PascalCase in the generated route type.

module.description: Fully qualified module name containing the type and functions (e.g., 'System' or 'MyProject.Common.Types')

type.description: Type name for the parameter (e.g., 'int', 'bool', 'Guid'). Defaults to 'string' if not specified.

parse.description: Function name to parse string to the type (e.g., 'parseInt', 'parseBool'). Must have signature: string -> 'T option

format.description: Function name to format the type to string (e.g., 'formatInt', 'formatBool'). Must have signature: 'T -> string

required.description: Whether the query parameter is required. If false, the type becomes '<type> option' in the generated route.
